features: Award-winning, bestselling, 6-in-1 skincare-hybrid tinted moisturizer infused with Vitamin C and mineral SPF moisturizes, protects, and perfects skin in one step; 9 blendable shades to flex across a wide range of skin tones; Works for all skin types

Multi-tasking formula provides the benefits of mineral SPF, skincare, + makeup in one step; Protects from harsh rays + blue light; Soothes + moisturizes; Color corrects + diffuses the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, blemishes, + uneven skin tone

Made With: 5% Pigment; Mineral Sunscreen – for UVA/UVB + blue light protection; Chemical-free SPF 30; Vitamin C – improves the appearance of uneven skin tone; Allantoin – soothes + moisturizes; Specialty Powders – fills lines + blurs imperfections
Made Without: Parabens, Phthalates, Talc, Synthetic Fragrances, Chemical Sunscreens
Cruelty Free; Vegan; Dermatologist Tested; Non-Comedogenic
body.description: This multi-tasking miracle worker provides the benefits of mineral SPF, skincare, and makeup all in one flawless step. The clean sunscreen protects skin from the harsh rays and defends against blue light, while the skin-loving formula soothes, nourishes, and moisturizes skin all day. Infused with Vitamin C, the lightweight, breathable skin tint is designed to color correct and diffuse the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, blemishes, pores, and uneven skin tone for a smooth, radiant complexion. Our blendable + luminous shades are designed with 5% pigment to complement a wide range of skin tones and undertones + provide the benefits of a sunscreen without the white cast. Now available in 9 versatile shades that complement a variety of skin tones within our extended shade range. Our existing 4 shades have been renamed to align with this extension: • TUNDRA: Fair, Neutral Undertones • ALABASTER: Fair/Light, Neutral Undertones (previously Fair) • TERRA: Light, Neutral Undertones • DUNE: Light/Medium, Neutral Undertones (previously Light) • ORO: Medium, Neutral Undertones • SAHARA: Medium/Deep, Neutral Undertones (previously Medium) • MOJAVE: Deep, Neutral Undertones (previously Deep) • SONORAN: Deep/Rich, Neutral Undertones • SOL: Rich, Neutral Undertones MADE WITH: • Mineral sunscreen: Physical SPF for UVA/UVB protection + helps defend against blue light • SPF 30: free from chemical sunscreens including chemical boosters like Butyloctyl Salicylate • Vitamin C: known to improve the appearance of uneven skin tone • Allantoin: soothes + moisturizes • Specialty Powders + Blurring spheres: help fill lines + blur imperfections MADE WITHOUT: Parabens, Phthalates, Talc, Synthetic Fragrances, Chemical Sunscreens

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really big fan. Going to re purchase.
reviews.reviewText: I always play around w different brands of tinted moisturizer with spf and this is one of my faves. Very nourishing and smoothing with a supple, dewy finish. It’s moisturizing which is great for dry winter months. Goes on thick but absorbs very well. Good natural coverage. Does not look like foundation. Feels like a thicker lotion. Requires cover up and or powder if trying to cover more specific imperfections like dark circles or pimples. Planning to repurchase because I’m running low.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight, smooth, good coverage, good spf, non-toxic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Long Lasting CC Cream
reviews.reviewText: This CC Cream has good coverage and stays in the face for a long time without granulating/falling apart. The color tonality is a bit strong and the finish is more smooth, so it shines a bit (no glitter, but more like a “liquid” shine), so be prepared for that. This product does not tend to create a natural look, but that is not a knock against it if you have no problem with make up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good color, wears well
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t make me break out. I have combination skin and it’s too shiny when I apply, finishing powder makes it look perfect. Rubs off a little with sweat or at the end of the day. but I wasn’t expecting it to stay on forever. Easy to blend. Use with concealer for fast, almost flawless skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mixed feelings.. wouldn’t recommend
reviews.reviewText: I would consider this to be medium coverage, it blurs imperfections well but won’t hide red.It is very thick, which I can understand from the sunscreen.. so maybe I will only use this for vacation? I have to mix it with moisturizer to get it to spread and even still it’s a whole struggle of a process.I also don’t enjoy how easily it wipes right off, scratch your face even a little and you can expect it under your nail.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: I like what honest beauty stands for and have been trying out a bunch of their products to find out what works for me. I am not someone who wears a lot of makeup but wanted to try this out just to have in my arsenal. Sunscreen plus moisturizing benefits, with tinted coverage? I'm all about fewer steps in my morning routine.Color: My skin tone is pretty close to Jessica Alba's, so based on other reviews noting that these tend to run dark I determined I was between fair and light. Ended up getting fair and now use this product as concealer to lighten and color correct my dark circles. I could probably get away with light for the rest of my face in the summer. Fair works great for me for concealer, and I love it.Size: At first I was disappointed when the product arrived and I realized it's a decently small tube - especially considering it's supposed to be used for the whole face, not just undereyes - but I quickly learned a little goes a long, long way. I use a half pump to cover my undereyes, so the tube will last me a long time.Consistency/Coverage: I would say the consistency is thinner and lighter than I expected, and it looks pretty dewy on the skin. Gotta give it a little time to soak in, and throw some powder on if you don't want to be too dewy/if you don't want it to crease. It's not totally full coverage, but I can easily build it up with another layer for when I want to wear more makeup than my regular everyday. Goes onto the skin easily with my fingers, it can really melt in. Love that I still look like a human and not an airbrushed doll. Works like a charm. When I first started using the product, it would pill on my skin, but I quickly realized I was simply not prepping my skin the right way - it doesn't go well onto dry skin. We all should be moisturizing before makeup, anyway :) Ever since I figured that out, it works like a charm.Overall: I love that I feel like I'm putting extra sunscreen protection on my sensitive undereye areas in addition to simply covering those dark circles. Apparently there's also vitamin C in it, but I don't think there's much, so just a small added bonus. Surprisingly great value. Thanks again, honest beauty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Awful. Don’t waste your money.
reviews.reviewText: First off I tired 3 different colors to finally get a semi match.Secondly it doesn’t cover anything but makes all zits and imperfections more pronounced.Thirdly it feels very heavy and thick on your face. Yuck.I’m returning and continuing my search for a good healthy foundation that works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Too thick. hard to spread
reviews.reviewText: It is thick . I had to add water to it so I could spread it. I ordered Terra Light and it didn't match my skin at all. Too much orange. It felt heavy on my skin. Also felt somewhat greasy.

reviews.reviewTitle: surprisingly very good coverage and moisturizing!
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit skeptical about getting it as the shade range is really bad. I watched a lot of youtube videos and realized that even Fair seems dark. but a lot of reviews also mentioned that once it's blended in, it's ok. Being a light skin myself, i thought maybe to give it a try. I'm glad I did! love this tinted moisturizer. it's moisturizing enough for my dry skin and also, the tone is not that bad. Once blended out, my skin looks good! it lasts a pretty good time too, without looking cakey and dry. good buy!

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable, doesn’t irritate, good coverage mineral sunscreen
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable, doesn’t irritate, good coverage mineral sunscreen , thick consistency
